pages.text: All though most of the farm's recipes are straight forward. The following farms, as well as their deepslate variants where applicable, have special recipes.$(br)$(li)Diamond Farm $(li)Emerald Farm $(li)Netherite Farm $(li)Concrete Farm$(br)They all require something in addition to the resource. Their recipes are displayed on the next few pages.

pages.title: Concrete Farm
pages.text: For this farm, just like in Vanilla, you must "Waterlog" the Concrete Powder Farm, by combining the Concrete Powder Farm with a water bucket. The Shovel Rank used in the Concrete Powder Farm will be converted into the corresponding Pickaxe Rank.$(br)

For example, if you made a Concrete Powder Farm with a Diamond Shovel, the Pickaxe used in the Concrete Farm will be Diamond. $(br)Once again, while the Recipe accepts Modded Shovels, they will all default to Wooden. But the conversion to a Concrete Farm from the Concrete Powder farm will NOT be possible.
